participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and caring, enjoys deep conversations and has a special connection with family.
participant_1.background: i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. horror movies are my favorites.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Curious and adventurous, loves sharing stories from her travels and enjoys helping others.
participant_2.background: i think i'll retire in a few years. i'm a librarian. i am 60years old. i really like to travel.
